helpMsg1: **Hey there!** I'm Manager, and I'm the main bot on the server! I power the server's bot adding process. Below are my commands, and right now, they are limited to staff. I'll have more added in the future, so sit tight!
**bot** - Displays a bot for you to add to your server!
helpMsg3: Right now, the only command you, a regular user, has access to, is `m/suggest`. That will send a message to us, the staff, with your suggestion for a bot to add! The syntax to do so is `m/suggest [name] [reason why we should add the bot] [invite link]`
